title: Story
description: Represents a narrative composed of a series of sequential video scripts.

storyId.description: A unique identifier for the entire story.

author.description: The writer(s) or creator(s) of the story.

logline.description: A one-sentence summary of the story's core plot.

synopsis.description: A brief overview of the story's plot and major themes.

characters.description: A list of all characters in the story, with their overarching descriptions.

characterId.description: A unique identifier for the character.

description.description: A high-level description of the character.

scripts.description: An ordered list of video scripts that make up the story. Each item should conform to the generic video script schema.

scriptId.description: A unique identifier for the script.

scriptNumber.description: The sequential number of the script within the story.

scriptDetails.description: The full content of the video script.
